comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Groove Art, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Katharine* Kaelred (1882–1942), Actress Trivia: Created the vamp role in the Broadway version of "A Fool There Was" in 1910, the role that later made Theda Bara famous. Born: May 9, 1882 in England, UK Died: March 26, 1942 (age 59) in New York City, New York, USA (according to www.imdb.com/name/nm0434469/) *should be Katherine, note by me Other pictures of her in www.npg.org.uk/collections/search/person/mp69068/katherin... See also article with photo in The Day book., October 20, 1914, LAST EDITION, Image 7
